description: Make a haunted house: Build it, Haunt it, Share it
name: Cadbury Haunted House Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 240 g The Natural Confectionery Co. Sour Squirms Lollies
144 g Cadbury Dairy Milk Freddo Milky Top

recipeInstructions.text: Using melted marshmallow adhere together a Jube (head) a marshmallow (body) and 4x Sour Squirms cut in half (legs) and position on your haunted house to form a spider. When choosing your favourite 180g CADBURY chocolate blocks to build your Haunted House, choose pure chocolate rather than soft centre.

Using melted marshmallow adhere together a Jube (head) a marshmallow (body) and 4x Sour Squirms cut in half (legs) and position on your haunted house to form a spider. When choosing your favourite 180g CADBURY chocolate blocks to build your Haunted House, choose pure chocolate rather than soft centre.
